#summary Release notes

Release Notes for My Tracks version 2.0
  * new database schema to include track icon
  * option to use track location as the default track name
  * track icon based on activity type. Currently has icons for biking, driving, skiing, running, and walking.
  * new sharing flow
  * fix Bluetooth and Ant+ sensors
  * add voice frequency and split frequency
  * after saving a track to SD card, can share the file
  * new chart view
  * new stats view
